body.name: Irontar Nightstands Set of 2, Nightstand with Charging Station, Bedside Table with Removable Shelf, Side Table with Open Storage and 2 Drawers, Night Stand for Bedroom, Natural BZZ001ME02
body.stockDetail: Only 20 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 12 hrs 29 mins
features: Two Is Better: Coordinate your home space with the natural nightstands set of 2! Each night stand with 2 AC outlets and 2 USB ports can help you charge the multiple electronic devices at the same time, such as phones, i-pads, laptops and table lamps etc.

Ample Storage Space & Removable Shelf: Irontar nightstand with 2 drawers and 2 open storage provide enough space for your home. The double-drawer design for the night stand is convenient for you to classify and place headphones, chargers, jewelry, personal items, etc. For the bottom cabinet, you can also remove the adjustable shelf to get a large space!

Sturdy & Durable: This end table is made up of high-quality EPA-grade particleboard. Stylish and durable. The versatile natural finish provides a silky smooth texture that can be cleaned with a gentle wipe, making your use easier
Perfect Size: Measurement 15.7''L x 13.8''W x 23.6''H, it is not only a bedside table, but also can be used as a coffee table, placed in the study, restaurant, office or other places

Easy to Assemble: You can easily put this night stand together in about 20 minutes with detailed, step by step instructions and labeled parts; If you encounter any problems before or after purchase, please contact us immediately

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Irontar Side Table with Charging Station

Smart Home Design This End table is equipped with 2 AC Outlets & 2 USB Ports, and a 5-foot power cord, which is ready for your mobile phone, headphones, table lamp, tablet and other electronic equipment to supply power.

2 AC outlets and 2 USB ports It can charge up to 4 devices at the same time, for example, lamp, phone, tablet and laptop Spacious Drawers 2 drawers are spacious enough for your beside or sofa side items Metal Handles The gold metal handles combine well with natural finish, adding the farmhouse style to your room Removable and Adjustable Shelf Comes with a removable shelf, making this side table into 2 open storage space with 3-height adjustable shelf, or removing it to get a large space!
Specifications: Color: NaturalMaterial: EPA-grade particleboardLoad capacity(max): 33.1lb Each drawer: 5.5lbProduct Size: 15.7"L x 13.8"W x 23.6"HSingle N.W: 22.1 lbSingle G.W: 25.4 lb
Package Contents: 2 x End Table2 x Instructions2 x Tools Bag

Notes: Children must be under adult supervision to use the product.It is forbidden children to climb or play on the product to avoid serious body injury caused by the tilt.During the assembly process, keep small parts out of the reach of children.It may be fatal if swallowed or inhaled. Please don't use this item as the ladder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love
reviews.reviewText: Arrive on time..Looks amazing for the price..easy to put together..It only to me about an hour. The lights were the only thing I had to figure out, but that wasn’t difficult. I would recommend buying..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to put together, however, not sure how sturdy it is. We’ll have to wait to see.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it
reviews.reviewText: The product is great. Study enough, cute. The instructions were very clear. It does makes a noise when open the drawers, but it doesn't annoy me that much. Check the measurement before paying, I did and it was perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Nighstand Set for the Value!!
reviews.reviewText: Over-all a wonderful set of nightstands for the price, love the built in power charger ports.I see many reviews noting their item arrived dinged or scratched but mine arrived with no such issues so the condition you receive it in may just be based on your local courier's handling. Listed my pors/cons about the item below:Pros:- Great value for a set of 2 night stands- Built in USB charger ports for convenience- Plenty of drawers/shelves for organization- Easy to assemble, it took me about an hour to build both, with no issuesCons:- Drawers are not on a rail system so they feel a little clunky when being used- Nightstand is a bit small (which worked for me) but may not work for everyone -- check the item dims before you purchase- No tools are provided so make sure you have you own philips & flat head screw driver or drill handy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Looks good...but not the best quality
reviews.reviewText: It is okay, but But I wouldn't buy again if I had the chance. The drawers are not firm or of good quality inside. It's not something that will last long.No están tan mal, pero no las compraría otra vez si tuviera la oportunidad. Las gavetas no son firmes ni de ni de buena calidad adentro. No una buena inversión a largo plazo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT! IT'S MISREPRESENTED
reviews.reviewText: It looks cool in the pictures but it's a LIE! I would give it no stars if I could. It's unstable, small, and the material is so thin. The box it came it was thicker. Plus the led lights are a total scam. To sticky light strips are what you get plus a "control" that you have to put it inches away for it to work, if it even decides too. It took hours to put together to only be completely disappointed. Tipped over when a child's lamp was put on top. Do not make the mistake that I did by ignoring the bad reviews and giving it a chance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very nice easy to put together and everything worked kind of small but that’s what I needed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and little
reviews.reviewText: The only thing I do not like about then is you can truly only have one thing plugged into the outlets because they are so close together. Besides that I am happy with them.
Great totally worth the money. Lots of parts which takes awhile to put together. Would definitely buy again
